readable.title: 3440160917_4524cfd9f6
readable.content: A child in a green sweatshirt is collecting colored eggs A small child is holding a basket of brightly colored Easter eggs and is picking up a pink one from the grass . A young boy carrying a basket collects Easter eggs in the grass . A young child is picking up Easter eggs in the grass . The child is carrying a basket of colored eggs and bending over with an egg in his hand .
